title: Birds of a feather
creator_credit: Terri Loewy, Nick Bosustow and Stephen Bosustow Productions
brief_description: An animated cartoon which focuses on the concept of nonconformity by telling a story about a bored, dejected bird, which, attracted by the beautiful plumes of a passerby’s hat, seizes the feathers, and proudly assumes a new appearance.
creator_credit_for_label: Terri Loewy, Nick Bosustow and Stephen Bosustow Productions
